entry.title: DevOps Interview Questions and Answers - Part I - Basics
entry.id: DevOps Interview Questions and Answers - Part I - Basics
entry.summary: DevOps is a set of practices that combines software development and IT operations. Here is a list of the top interview questions asked to bag a role in DevOps field.

entry.title: Docker Vs Virtual Machines(VMs)
entry.summary: Virtualization comes in handy with the need of running multiple simulated environments in a single machine without installing and configuring each instance. Virtualization has its used cases in many scenarios such as testing your app in multiple environments/devices.
